title: Thunderbird keeps asking me for my google passwords over and over
creator: transam98
content:
Ive got appx 10-15 accounts in thunderbird about 5 or 6 DONT rememeber or keep the passwords (for gmail)... others do (for gmail)

Ive got it set as I recall for imap, but when I open thunderbird I get the google popup to sign in (it does as Ive got the PW right) but it never remembers those ones and constantly keeps asking me wither if I leave thunderbird open or if I close it and reopen it... again the PW's are correct as it DOES log in just for some reason thunderbird isnt saving or remembering them anyone have any idea as to why ? thanks in advance !!
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/144.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;os:Windows 10

title: selected new email address as default, deleted old address, old email all gone?
creator: dacyak
content: Cut the cable a couple months ago. Have been using Firefox/Tbird many years. Stopped being able to access old email address of 25 years a couple days ago. When opened Tbird would always got to old email and say "couldn't log in" or something. Would cancel out of that twice, click on new address and collect new address email. Old email was always there, used it as reference during transition. At settings chose new as default and deleted old address. Looks like the boxes checked would not have deleted old email but it's gone. 3500+ of them. No warning, message, choice, nothing. took zero time. Cannot change in Mozilla login to new email address. Tried Tbird import tool, could seem to figure it out. Also need to update email in Mozilla. Help. Tks. dacyak@yahoo.com
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:147.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/147.0;tb_version:Tbird version is current;os:Windows 10;kb_visits_prior:["/en-US/kb/profiles-where-thunderbird-stores-user-data", "/en-US/kb/thunderbird-import", "/en-US/kb/manual-account-configuration"]

title: ２週間分の受信メールが消えたときの解決策
creator: info8925
content: サンダーバードについて 今朝PC起動し確認したところ、 昨日(2/17)から2週間分のメール（2月3日15:19以降～2月17日22:51以前)が突然消えました。 昨日PCシャットダウンするまでは正常でした。 また、2月17日22:51から本日分は正常に受信できています。 原因と解決策を教えていただきたいです。
